name: @bitovi/calendar-events-component
description: custom element that shows a google calendar

scripts.version: git commit -am "Update version number" && git checkout -b release && git add -f dist/
scripts.postpublish: git push --tags && git checkout main && git branch -D release && git push
scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run testee
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public
